Wheeljack-X::

Wheeljack's facial expression is invisible save for his eyes (thanks 
to his faceplate), but these betray a bit of amusement as he makes a 
point of giving Cygnar the finger in plain view of everyone.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rudra656" <Rudra656@a...> wrote:
> OOC: I know it's shot buti'm leaving in an hour and i'm going to 
> leave all of the actual negotiations to my friend.  He'll still be 
> posting under my name though.
> 
> ::Cygnar::
>      He takes the offered seat.  "Thank you for meeing wih me.  I 
am 
> aware how much you hate Lord Galvatron and how much he hates you."  
> He glances around the room.  "Ah, the conforting feeling of 
> distrust.  It's reasuring.  I had thought that Maximals were too 
weak 
> to be distrustful.  i am gladd to see that I am wrong."
